name: A fascinating story: Wedding Night
description:
Game background

This is just a story that happened in the past. It has long passed now, but it really happened. It is a story that changed Do Yeon’s life.
She once had a very smooth life, a delicate and pleasant appearance, a financially superior family background, and a decent job. No, she just successfully arrested the most difficult criminal this month, perfectly breaking the rumors. It's a pity that she chose to marry her subordinate when she was about to be promoted.
However, they have been in love for many years and their relationship is very stable.
And tonight was their wedding night's carnival party~ Of course she wouldn't miss it, so she dressed up and went with her husband.
But no one expected that the two policemen would be retaliated by their enemies... It was difficult for her to fight with her four fists. On this night, she was about to spend the darkest night in her life...

Gameplay

This is a very simple card flip game where you turn over a card and then try to find another card that matches it.
You only need to click on the card to find the same card as the image that appears, and the identical ones will be eliminated. After all the cards are eliminated, the heroine's story can be unlocked...
